English: the Northern Expedition, the Nationalists' campaign of 1926-1928 under Chiang Kai-shek, against the rule of local warlords

d.f: `民國~`十~`五~`年~，`國民革命軍~`北~`進~，`討伐~`北洋軍閥~`的~`戰役~。`民國~`十~`五~`年~，`國民革命軍~`在~`蔣~`總司令~`中正~`領導~`下~，`進~`討~`北洋軍閥~，`至~`十~`七~`年~`統一~`全國~，`史~`稱~`為~「`北伐~」。

English: the Northern Expedition, the Nationalists' campaign of 1926-1928 under Chiang Kai-shek, against the rule of local warlords
